title: Nvidia slides 13% in three days after briefly becoming most valuable company
content: Nvidia shares fell 6.7% on Monday, the chipmaker's third down day in a row, and the stock is now off 13% from its peak last week.
summary: Nvidia shares fell 6.7% on Monday, the chipmaker's third down day in a row, and the stock is now off 13% from its peak last week.

title: Oracle warns that a TikTok ban would hurt business
content: Oracle provides cloud services to TikTok, and is warning investors that a ban of the app could hurt the company's revenue.
summary: Oracle provides cloud services to TikTok, and is warning investors that a ban of the app could hurt the company's revenue.

title: Asia-Pacific markets set for mixed open after U.S. tech sell-off
content: Investors in Asia will assess South Korea's consumer sentiment index for June, as well as Japan's service sector producer prices.
summary: Investors in Asia will assess South Korea's consumer sentiment index for June, as well as Japan's service sector producer prices.

title: Fast fashion retailer Shein confidentially files for London IPO as U.S. listing stalls
content: Shein confidentially filed for a U.S. initial public offering late in 2023, but the retailer has faced mounting backlash.

title: Bitcoin tumbles below $60,000 to start the week
content: The cryptocurrency has been stuck between $60,000 and $70,000 since March.

title: South Korea plant fire kills 22 people after lithium battery combustion
content: A fire that broke out at a South Korean lithium battery plant has killed 22 people, local officials said

title: China employing 'gray zone tactics' at contested Second Thomas Shoal, Lowy Institute's Yaacob says

title: China wants EU to scrap planned higher tariffs and 'abide by WTO rules,' state media reports
content: Scrapping the tariff decision on Chinese EVs is set to benefit both sides, Global Times reported, quoting observers.

title: 34-year-old making $400,000 at TikTok: Being let go from Meta in 2022 was 'perfect timing'

title: Ferrari CEO says all-electric model preserves the 'emotion' of the famed supercars

title: OpenAI walks back controversial stock sale policies, will treat current and former employees the same

title: Southeast Asia is a top choice for firms diversifying supply chains amid U.S.-China tensions
content: Rising tensions between Washington and Beijing have led firms to diversify supply chains away from China even as they maintain a presence in the country.

title: Novo Nordisk to build $4.1 billion North Carolina facility to boost output of Wegovy, Ozempic
content: The new plant in Clayton, North Carolina, will be responsible for filling and packaging syringes and injection pens for Wegovy, Ozempic and other drugs.

title: Paramount+ to increase prices for its streaming plans

title: Disney's 'Inside Out 2' could be the first billion-dollar movie of 2024

title: Trump Media stock soars 21%, breaking weekslong decline in DJT share price

title: 'Inside Out 2' adds ennui to its cast of emotions: How the feeling affects Gen Z workers, from a psychologist who worked on the film
